This comes from testing in pull request #392, @scpeters and me just did a test on my local machine and if we started gazebo paused, go step by step, the world is started properly and atlas is stand up just fine.

When running using the standard launch method, the gazebo screen is frozen in black for long time and after that, the robot appeared fallen on the floor.

Other people is not finding this problem so looks like a race condition (related to performance) at some point of our starting procedure.
